record.dc:title: 116MG31 Hiwassee Island Site 37MG31, Meigs County, Tennessee. 37MG31 - Earth mound. Feature 41C, Level E. Fireplace of Feature 41. Direction east.
record.wpa:narrative: This fire basin is almost centrally located and is raised 0.1' above the floor on a square base. The fire pit is circular, 0.7' in diameter and 0.2' deep. It was completely covered over by white ash which extended down into the fire pit. Over the ashes, Feat. 40 lay very thin with some of the ash showing through. The basin was made of puddled clay burnt brick red.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustrations on file at the institution. See also photographs 115MG31 [fhm01227], 117MG31 [fhm01229], 119MG31 [fhm01232], 132MG31 [fhm01238], BMG31(D) [fhm01289], BMG31(E) [fhm01290], BMG31(F) [fhm01291], BMG31(G) [fhm01292], and BMG31(H) [fhm01293].
